testcase.name: test_prioritize_tasks
testcase.failure:
self = <tests.test_task_management.TestTaskManagement testMethod=test_prioritize_tasks>
def test_prioritize_tasks(self): # Create tasks with urgency and importance t1 = Task(id=1, title="Task 1", priority=1, deadline=datetime.date.today() + datetime.timedelta(days=3)) t2 = Task(id=2, title="Task 2", priority=5, deadline=datetime.date.today() + datetime.timedelta(days=1)) self.tm.tasks = {1: t1, 2: t2} sorted_tasks = self.tm.prioritize_tasks() # Task 2 should have higher priority due to higher importance and urgency > self.assertEqual(sorted_tasks[0].id, 2) E AssertionError: 1 != 2
projects/current_project/tests/test_task_management.py:45: AssertionError
